heading: Overview
items: Single-file quiz app (quiz-app.html) — no dependencies, no build tools
Uses Automata Learning Lab brand design (brutalist, no border-radius)
Just open in browser: open quiz-app.html

heading: JSON Quiz Format
items: Optional fields: explanation, source (shown as feedback)

heading: App Views & State
items: State variables: questions[], currentQuestion, score, results[]

heading: Export Formats
items: CSV: Question, Your Answer, Correct Answer, Result columns
Markdown (LLM Review): Structured for AI review with prompts
Anki: Semicolon-delimited question;answer for flashcard import

heading: Design System (CSS Custom Properties)
items: Typography: IBM Plex Sans (body), JetBrains Mono (buttons/code)

heading: Key Functions
items: handleFileUpload() — Parse JSON, enable Start button
displayQuestion() — Render MC options or open-ended textarea
submitAnswer() — Check answer, update score, show feedback
showImmediateFeedback() — Animated panel with explanation + source
